name: Planet Smashers [Unity WebPlayer]
description:
Smash the other player into the Sun!

Controls (Xbox Controller)

Left Stick - Turning

Right Trigger - Thrust

A - Fire

B - Tractor Beam

Controls (Keyboard - player one || player two)

W/A/D || I/J/K - Thrust / Left / Right

E || U - fire

Space || N - Tractor Beam

CREDITS:

Nik Aggarwal - programming!

Nick Komarnicki - sound!

Philippe McNally - art!
